title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
Minimum of two (2) A' Level passes in Social Science subjects.

Accounting Technician Scheme (ATS)

Minimum of Lower Credit in National Diploma

Minimum of two passes in JUPEB/IJMB
utme_requirements:
Five (5) O' Level credit passes at not more than two sittings.

i. English

ii. Mathematics

iii. Any two O' Level Social Science subjects
subjects: English, Mathematics and any other two Social Science subjects

title: ACTUARIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Economics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics plus any other two (2)            relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: AGRIC EXTENSION & RURAL DEVELOPMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or equivalents in Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Botany/Zoology/Economics/Mathematics/Physics/Geography/Geology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes  in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science plus one of Physics, Geography and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology /Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics

title: AGRICULTURAL ECONOMICS & FARM MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and one of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science and Mathematics or Physics.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANIMAL PRODUCTION AND FISHERIES
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ Level passes or equivalent in Chemistry and one of Biology/Botany /Zoology/Agricultural Science/ Geography/Geology/ Mathematics/Economics
utme_requirements: Five SSC credit passes in Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and English Language.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Physics/Mathematics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOINFORMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology, Physics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BOTANY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) subjects from Social Sciences or Arts.
subjects: Economics/Commerce and any other two Commercial or Social Science subjects.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
A/L pass in any two of Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

NCE merit pass in Mathematics and one other Science or Social Science Subject.
utme_requirements: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, any other two science or social science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science or Social Science Subject

title: CRIMINOLOGY & SECURITY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any three (3) subjects: Business Management, History, Economics, Government, and any of the Arts and Social Sciences. A pass in Mathematics is required
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' credit passes in English Language and any other four (4) credit passes in Arts and Social Science subject.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Any three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: CROP PRODUCTION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Botany/Zoology or Physics/Mathematics/Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics and one Science/Social Science subject and at least 'O' Level pass in Physics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Mathematics or Physics

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2) A' Level passes in Social Science or Art subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other subjects

title: FINANCE
de_requirements:
Minimum of two (2) A' Level passes in Social Science subjects.

Accounting Technician Scheme (ATS)

Minimum of Lower Credit in National Diploma

Minimum of two (2) passes in Social Science subjects in JUPEB/IJMB
utme_requirements:
Five (5) O' Level credit passes at not more than two sittings

i. English Language

ii. Mathematics

iii. Any two O' Level Social Science subjects
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any two Social Science subjects

title: FOOD SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Physics/Agric Science/Botany/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics, Basic Catering and Food Services, Bakery and    Confectionaries, Hotel & Catering Crafty course (Cookery), Hotel & Catering Craft Course (Food /Drinks Services) and Basic Electricity.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics/ Physics and Biology/ Agricultural Science

title: GEOLOGY & MINERAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: HISTORY & DIPLOMATIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE (upper credit) in History/ Government and any other related subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Geography, Government/History.
subjects: History/Government and any other two (2) subjects from the Arts and Social Sciences.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and any of Physics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

title: INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS & PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Economics, Business Management, Government, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics plus any two (2) subjects from Social Sciences or Arts.
subjects: Economics and two (2) subjects from Social Sciences or Arts.

title: INFORMATION & COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
1. A/L pass in any two of Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.


2. NCE merit pass in Mathematics and one other Science or Social Science Subject
utme_requirements: English Language, Mathematics, Physics, any other two science or social science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science or Social Science Subject

title: MARKETING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Marketing/Economics/Commerce and two (2) other subjects from Commercial or Social Sciences.
subjects: Marketing/Economics and any other two (2) Commercial or Social Science subjects.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS & STATISTICS
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and either Physics or Chemistry

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and either Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three(3) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Additional/Further Mathematics.
subjects: Maths, Physics and Chemistry or Biology

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics

title: PHYSICS WITH ELECTRONICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE & INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Government and one other Social Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes in Government or History and at least a pass in Mathematics
subjects: English Language, Government and any other two relevant subjects

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) A' Level passes including Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credit passes including English Language, Government or History and at least a pass in Mathematics
subjects: English Language, Government and any other two relevant subjects

title: SECRETARIAL ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting and Business Management.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Economics and three (3) other subjects plus at least a pass in Mathematics. For NBC holders, three (3) other Subjects could be from any of the following: Office Practice, Secretarial Duties, Principles of Accounts, Shorthand 80 WPM and Typewriting 35 WPM.
subjects: Economics and Two (2) other subjects.

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' credit passes in English Language and any other four (4) credit passes in Arts and Social Science subject.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: SOIL & ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agric Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i)      Two (2) A’ LEVEL passes in Geography and Mathematics

ND/HND upper credit in Town Planning or related programmes plus UTME requirements are accepted
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Art, History, IRK/CRK, Social Studies and Tech Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
